ticket.title: Error HTTP Response 301 fetching http://gems.rubyforge.org/yaml when attempt to install any gem
ticket.original-body:
~$ sudo gem install rails
ERROR: While executing gem ... (Gem::RemoteSourceException) HTTP Response 301 fetching http://gems.rubyforge.org/yaml
~$ gem env
RubyGems Environment: - RUBYGEMS VERSION: 1.1.1 - RUBY VERSION: 1.8.6 (2007-09-24 patchlevel 111) [i486-linux] - INSTALLATION DIRECTORY: /var/lib/gems/1.8 - RUBY EXECUTABLE: /usr/bin/ruby1.8 - RUBYGEMS PLATFORMS: - ruby - x86-linux - GEM PATHS: - /var/lib/gems/1.8 - GEM CONFIGURATION: - :update_sources => true - :verbose => true - :benchmark => false - :backtrace => false - :bulk_threshold => 1000 - REMOTE SOURCES: - http://gems.rubyforge.org
~$ gem -v
1.1.1
ticket.latest-body:
~$ sudo gem install rails
ERROR: While executing gem ... (Gem::RemoteSourceException) HTTP Response 301 fetching http://gems.rubyforge.org/yaml

RubyGems Environment: - RUBYGEMS VERSION: 1.1.1 - RUBY VERSION: 1.8.6 (2007-09-24 patchlevel 111) [i486-linux] - INSTALLATION DIRECTORY: /var/lib/gems/1.8 - RUBY EXECUTABLE: /usr/bin/ruby1.8 - RUBYGEMS PLATFORMS: - ruby - x86-linux - GEM PATHS: - /var/lib/gems/1.8 - GEM CONFIGURATION: - :update_sources => true - :verbose => true - :benchmark => false - :backtrace => false - :bulk_threshold => 1000 - REMOTE SOURCES: - http://gems.rubyforge.org
~$ gem -v
1.1.1

HTTP Response 301 fetching http://gems.rubyforge.org/yaml

- RUBYGEMS VERSION: 1.1.1 - RUBY VERSION: 1.8.6 (2007-09-24 patchlevel 111) [i486-linux] - INSTALLATION DIRECTORY: /var/lib/gems/1.8 - RUBY EXECUTABLE: /usr/bin/ruby1.8 - RUBYGEMS PLATFORMS:

version.title: Error HTTP Response 301 fetching http://gems.rubyforge.org/yaml when attempt to install any gem

version.body: Please update your rubygems to 1.3.7. @@@ gem update --system @@@ Thanks.
version.body-html:
Please update your rubygems to 1.3.7.

gem update --system
Thanks.
version.title: Error HTTP Response 301 fetching http://gems.rubyforge.org/yaml when attempt to install any gem
